title: War Rug, 2009-5-1, 1979–90
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 154 x 89 cm (60 5/8 x 35 1/16 in.)
description: Prayer-rug sized carpet with dark blue ground, field and border layout, knotted fringe. The field and border both include traditional medallion and floral motifs along with weaponry, including tanks and "butterfly" landmines.
